issue.title: [C++] Compilation warnings in release mode
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5029](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5029). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Those come up when running the release verification script.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5029?focusedCommentId=16802876) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Some of those warnings hint at memory leaks.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5029?focusedCommentId=16803542) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4049
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4049>
